Kendindeki her %1 eksik Can için +0.5% daha fazla hasar vur (Maks %25)

levelList.name: Moment of Erudition
levelList.desc:
[StartBattle] Gain [KnowledgeTraining] equal to [KnowledgeExplored] on self
[WhenUse] [Discard] 2 of this birim's Skills in ascending order of ranks from all of its Skill Slots

levelList.name: Moment of Erudition
levelList.desc:
<style="highlight">Deal +3% more damage for every [KnowledgeExplored] on self (max 9%)</style>
[StartBattle] Apply [KnowledgeTraining] equal to [KnowledgeExplored] on self <style="highlight"> to a random ally</style> and on self <style="highlight">(prioritizes allies with [Discard] that has the least [KnowledgeTraining])</style>
[WhenUse] [Discard] 2 of this birim's Skills in ascending order of ranks from all of its Skill Slots
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Sinking], Coin Power +1</style>

levelList.name: Moment of Erudition
levelList.desc:
Deal <style="highlight">+5%</style> more damage for every [KnowledgeExplored] on self (max <style="highlight">15%</style>)
[StartBattle] Apply [KnowledgeTraining] equal to [KnowledgeExplored] on self <style="highlight">to 2 random allies</style> and on self (prioritizes allies with [Discard] that has the least [KnowledgeTraining])
[WhenUse] [Discard] 2 of this birim's Skills in ascending order of ranks from all of its Skill Slots
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Sinking] on target (max 2)</style>

levelList.name: Scorch Knowledge
levelList.desc:
Deal +3% more damage for every [KnowledgeExplored] on self (max 18%)
[WhenUse] If target has 6+ [Sinking], Coin Power +1
[BeforeAttack] Consume all [KnowledgeTraining] on self and gain half of that value as additional [KnowledgeExplored] (rounded down)
[EndSkill] At 4+ [KnowledgeExplored], reset value to 1 (if this Skill defeats an enemy, reset value to 3 instead)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict [Sinking] Potency/Count equal to [KnowledgeExplored] value against the target (how much of that [Sinking] is Potency or Count is randomly determined)

levelList.name: Scorch Knowledge
levelList.desc:
Deal <style="highlight">+5%</style> more damage for every [KnowledgeExplored] (max <style="highlight">45%</style>)
<style="highlight">[WhenUse] Coin Power +1 for every 6 [Sinking] on target (max 2)</style>
[BeforeAttack] Consume all [KnowledgeTraining] on self and gain <style="highlight">the same value</style> as additional [KnowledgeExplored]
[EndSkill] At 4+ [KnowledgeExplored], reset value to 1 (if this Skill defeats an enemy, reset value to 3 instead)

coindescs.desc: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict [Sinking] Potency/Count equal to [KnowledgeExplored] value against the target (how much of that [Sinking] is Potency or Count is randomly determined)<style="highlight"></style>
